mapper.select: select sm.memb_pt_no midpointNo, sm.lat, sm.lng, sm.addr, m.name mname, m.roadname_addr maddr, g.g_no gno, c.cal_no, c.name calname, c.content calcontent from gms_select_midpoint sm inner join gms_memb m on (sm.memb_no = m.memb_no) inner join gms_group g on (sm.g_no = g.g_no) inner join gms_calendar c on (sm.cal_no = c.cal_no) where g.gno = 1 and cal_no=1 order by sm.memb_pt_no

select a.act_no accountingNo, a.g_no, a.act_cate_no, act.name cateName, a.title, a.amount, a.reg_Dt, a.status, st.g_no, st.memb_no, st.pay_dt from gms_accounting a inner join gms_accounting_cate act on (a.act_cate_no = act.act_cate_no) left outer join gms_accounting_status st on (a.act_no = st.act_no) where a.act_no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into gms_accounting(g_no, act_cate_no, title, amount, status) values(#{group.no}, #{actCate.no}, #{title}, #{amount}, #{status})

choose.when:
insert into gms_accounting_status(act_no, g_no, memb_no, pay_dt) values
(#{accountingNo}, #{memberStatus.gNo}, #{memberStatus.membNo}, #{memberStatus.paydt})

insert into gms_accounting_status(act_no, g_no, memb_no) values
(#{accountingNo}, #{memberStatus.gNo}, #{memberStatus.membNo})

mapper.update: update gms_accounting set g_no=#{group.no}, act_cate_no=#{actCate.no}, title=#{title}, amount=#{amount}, status=#{status} where act_no=#{accountingNo}
mapper.select: select * from gms_accounting_cate order by act_cate_no asc
